The Wilson-Medimorec MIND Lab is a [collaborative research group](https://www.themindlab.uk/about.html) co-led by Dr Christopher Wilson and Dr Srdan Medimorec, who are based in the Department of Psychology at Teesside University. **The Cognitive Neuroscience of Risk & Gambling Harms.**

:::
::: {.column width="50%"}



**Language, meta-cognition, implicit learning.** 

[Learn more about language and learning research here](research/langlearn.qmd){.btn .btn-success}

:::
:::


We use a range of methods, including functional near-infrared spectroscopy (fNIRS), eye-tracking, and virtual reality, to study these processes in both healthy and clinical populations.
